item.title: #24 - Support
item.description: What do we pay our money for when buying things? How the manufacturers reduce cost fighting for the clients in the market of falling margin? Often we suffer from that without even realizing. The support which follows the service is the most undervalued stage of the relationship with the customer. Sadly it gets undercut and overlooked more often, not as we hoped it would be. Companies reduce the support team chasing higher margins.
